targets.query: from(bucket: "k6") |> range(start: -15m) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "signalr") |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "latency")
from(bucket: "k6") |> range(start: -15m) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "signalr" and r._field == "latency") |> mean()
from(bucket: "k6") |> range(start: -15m) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "signalr" and r._field == "latency") |> quantile(q:0.95, method:"estimate_tdigest")
from(bucket: "k6") |> range(start: -15m) |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "signalr" and r._field == "latency") |> quantile(q:0.99, method:"estimate_tdigest")
